description: This file defines the 'Response' class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which inherits from a message class and provides methods to access response identifiers, check for result or error states, and retrieve JSON objects for results or errors. It is part of a WebSocket JSON-RPC communication mechanism.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC Response message, providing accessors for message IDs, checking for result or error states, and retrieving associated JSON objects.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Default constructor for the Response class.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Retrieves the ID associated with this response.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks whether this response contains a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result object if available.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks whether this response indicates an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error object if available.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Validates whether the response message is properly formed.
